tool_description: Tracks and logs submission events, status changes, and workflow progress throughout the manuscript review process with timestamp recording.

submission_id.description: Unique identifier for the manuscript submission

event_type.description: Type of event: submitted, validated, screened, assigned, reviewed, decided

event_details.description: Detailed description of the event or status change

responsible_party.description: Person or system responsible for this event

additional_metadata.description: JSON string with additional event-specific data

error_messages: Invalid submission ID: Submission identifier must be a non-empty string.
Unknown event type: Use submitted, validated, screened, assigned, reviewed, or decided.
Empty event details: Event description cannot be empty.
Invalid metadata format: additional_metadata must be valid JSON string or None.
Database update failed: Unable to record tracking event in submission database.
usage: Provide submission ID, event type, and detailed description. Optionally specify responsible party and additional metadata. The tool logs the event with timestamp for audit trail.

tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for this tracking entry

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when event was recorded

status_updated.description: Whether submission status was changed by this event

current_status.description: Current status of the submission after this event

workflow_stage.description: Current stage in the review workflow
